newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan overnights end up on fund shortage.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan overnights end up on fund shortage.

text.p: Pakistan's money rates ended up on Saturday amid a continuing fund shortage and are likely to remain high in the next trading week, dealers said.
"The week ended on a tight note with overnights traded at 20 percent," a dealer said. "But today, the market was inactive and most deals were rolled over at the same rate of yesterday."
At the end of the day, the discounting of around 5.5 billion rupees was also reported, dealer said.
